composer.rawText:
[Song Title: Channels of Light]
[Style: electro, breakbeat, clean studio recording, conversational male vocal]
[Caption: Systems hum until color speaks.]
[Image: RGB bars dissolving into motion.]
[Refresh Title: R to the G to the B]
[Theme: System & Process]
[Gradients: 3]
[Rank: 27]
[Title Rarity: 1.70]
[Seeds: 88304, A:41, B:6, C:199, D:72]
[Perspective: system_voice → we_community]
[Concept: Simple rules, vivid results.]
[Topic: System & Process → rules_as_music]
[Genre Bias: electro → breakbeat]
[Style Change: Reset]
[Modulation: none]
[Hook Prominence: high]
[Deviation: crisp contrast]
[Created: February 10, 2026 at 9:30 PM]
[Composer Version: v2.6]

[Intro]
[Glitch clicks, metronomic synth, no vocals]

[Fragment A]
[Dry drum machine, mono bass]
Red sets the baseline  
Green finds the groove  
Blue holds the ceiling  
That’s how we move  

[Reset]
[Tempo hiccup, filter sweep]
R to the G to the B  

[Fragment B]
[Beat widens, syncopated hats]
Every rule hums softly  
Till it’s played just right  
Numbers turn to feeling  
Signals turn to light  

[Bridge]
[Breakdown bridge, vocals closer]
We don’t need the noise loud  
We just tune the frame  
Small decisions repeating  
Never twice the same  

[Final Chorus]
[Full beat return, call-and-response backing]
R to the G to the B  
Watch the pattern breathe  
Simple lines in motion  
Show us what we see  

[Ending]
[Strip to pulse and echo]
R to the G to the B
